hero.title: Simple, transparent pricing
hero.subtitle: WaitQ pays for itself with one recovered table a day.

testimonial.quote: WaitQ cut our wait times by 35%. Guests love the SMS updates and our staff stays organized.
testimonial.author: Maria

items.question: Can I use WaitQ for free?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a free tier to get started. You can upgrade as your needs grow.

items.question: What are the benefits of a virtual waitlist software in a physical business?
items.answer: A virtual waitlist reduces crowding at your entrance, keeps customers informed with accurate wait times, reduces walk-aways, and frees up your staff from constantly answering "how much longer?" questions. It also provides valuable analytics to optimize your operations.

items.question: Do we need to purchase hardware?
items.answer: No. WaitQ works on any device with a web browser - tablets, phones, or computers you already own. No special hardware, pagers, or equipment needed.

items.question: What is the expected ROI of WaitQ?
items.answer: Most restaurants see ROI within the first month through increased table turnover and reduced walk-aways. With just one additional seated party per day, WaitQ pays for itself.

items.question: Is billing based on each waitlist?
items.answer: No, billing is based on your plan tier. You can create unlimited waitlists within your plan limits.

items.question: Do you offer real-time insights and analytics?
items.answer: Yes! WaitQ provides real-time analytics including average wait times, peak hours, customer patterns, and more to help you optimize your operations.

items.question: Is WaitQ easy to set up?
items.answer: Yes! WaitQ can be set up in under 5 minutes. Simply create an account, configure your waitlist settings, and you're ready to start managing your queue.

seo.title: WaitQ Pricing Plans
seo.description: Simple, transparent pricing for digital waitlist management. See plans that scale with your business.
